body:
My local setup fails with signal 0xb, but with slightly different stack trace. No indication of GC involvement, 
  fatal error: unexpected signal during runtime execution
  [signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0x40 pc=0x339e8]
  ...
  fatal error: runtime: stack split at bad time
  panic during panic
The builder and mine use different android device and different ndk versions (r9 vs r10). I am not familiar with runtime internal or compiler enough - but is there any chance that changes like different register use interfere and surface underlying bugs? I've never observed this type of failure before rev ca9128f18fe7. cc @crawshaw attached the full stack trace:
